name: Friday Night Funkin' - Character Test Collection
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' - Character Test Collection
description:
Friday Night Funkin' - Character Test Collection (FNFCTC) | Controls - Arrow Keys, A, B, Space, or tap the buttons if you're on mobile.

This was inspired by FNF CTP Remake (MadManToss) and ShannonSunday's character test videos.

(This is still in development! The current working characters are Boyfriend, Daddy Dearest, and Pico.)
